0.text: Sonia : Who is that tall player
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='soʊniə'>Sonia</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> Who <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> that <break time='200ms'/> tall <break time='200ms'/> player <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='varuni'>Waruni</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> She's <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='t̪ard͡ʒini'>Tharjini</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sivaliŋgam'>Sivalingam</phoneme>. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='soʊniə'>Sonia</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> She <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> very <break time='200ms'/> tall <break time='200ms'/> ! <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: Waruni : She was the world's best
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='varuni'>Waruni</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> She <break time='200ms'/> was <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> world's <break time='200ms'/> best <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='soʊniə'>Sonia</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> : <break time='200ms'/> Hurrah! <break time='200ms'/> It's <break time='200ms'/> our <break time='200ms'/> national <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: Get the students to read/enact the dialogue. Ask the following questions.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Get <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> read/enact <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> dialogue. <break time='200ms'/> Ask <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> following <break time='200ms'/> questions. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> favourite <break time='200ms'/> game/sport? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• <break time='200ms'/> With <break time='200ms'/> whom <break time='200ms'/> do <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> play? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• <break time='200ms'/> Who <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> favourite <break time='200ms'/> sportsperson? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

12.text: • What sports are there in your school?
12.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> sports <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> there <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> school? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

13.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Ask <break time='200ms'/> more <break time='200ms'/> questions. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
